title: Neglected virtue, or, The Unhappy conqueror a play acted at the Theatre-Royal by His Majesty's servants.
author: Hopkins, Charles, 1664?-1700?
publisher: Printed for Henry Rhodes, Richard Parker, Sam. Briscoe,
notes: Attributed by Wing to Charles Hopkins.
Based in part on John Fletcher's Pilgrim.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
